mapper.select: select id, name, matchId, matchName, matchLogoUrl, sportId, sportName, sportLogoUrl, leftTeamId, leftTeamName, rightTeamId, rightTeamName, leftTeamLogoUrl, rightTeamLogoUrl, leftTeamScore, rightTeamScore, playTypeCount, startTime, endTime, status, autoSwitchStatus, boCount, realBoCount, result, createTime from guess_match_versus where id = #{id}
